rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: Spacious lobby with natural light and Vastu oriented entrance, designed to welcome positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-concept living area with eco-friendly materials and large windows for natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with minimalistic design and green plants.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact, ergonomic kitchen using energy-saving appliances and natural stone countertops.
eco_features: ventilation system for indoor air quality

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Functional guest toilet with water-saving fixtures and eco-friendly tiles.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Designed to face the auspicious direction as per Vastu, ensuring positive energy flow.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Small balcony providing access to the garden area and natural light to adjacent rooms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with energy-efficient windows and natural lighting, following Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Well-ventilated bedroom with sustainable materials and natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom designed for flexibility, using eco-friendly furniture.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom with water-saving fixtures and green materials.

rooms.name: Study/Work Area
rooms.description: Designated study area with natural light and energy-saving LED bulbs.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Provides a view of the garden and swimming pool, encouraging relaxation.

openings.name: Staircase Access
